sentences.sContent: It took us ages to choose a new carpet.
sentences.sCn: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.sContent: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.sCn: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.sContent: He chose his words carefully as he spoke.
I don’t mind which one we have – you choose.
sentences.sCn: 我们要哪一个我无所谓，你来挑吧。

words.tran: 选择器；选举人；选择者；投票者

trans.tranOther: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want
